observation.reason: The website has unusually low prices and claims of free items as well as information on a non-existent company. The text on the website also contains psychological targeting with phrases like Das hast du noch nie gesehen (You've never seen this before) and Heißer Online-Verkauf (Hot online sale). The payment methods and privacy of customer information are not clearly stated and the information on the website has not been updated.
